mapper.sql: select order_id,company_id, order_number,journey_id, node_id, power_id, driver_id, car_id, user_id, use_car_mode, service_type, state, tripartite_order_id, tripartite_platform_code, driver_name, driver_mobile, car_license, flight_number, demand_car_level, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,car_model,car_color,driver_grade ,flight_plan_take_off_time,it_is_supplement from order_info

SELECT a.order_id AS orderId, a.state, d.apply_type AS applyType, b.type AS serverType, c.plan_begin_address AS useCarCity, e.nick_name AS applyUserName, e.nick_name AS useCarUserName,
a.use_car_mode AS useCarMode, a.driver_name AS driverName, a.driver_mobile AS driverTel, f.car_type as carType, f.car_license AS carLicense, h.regimen_id as regimenId, h.it_is_return as itIsReturn FROM order_info a LEFT JOIN journey_user_car_power b ON a.power_id = b.power_id LEFT JOIN journey_node_info c ON a.node_id = c.node_id LEFT JOIN apply_info d ON b.apply_id = d.apply_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user e ON e.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN car_info f ON a.car_id=f.car_id LEFT JOIN journey_info h on a.journey_id=h.journey_id
mapper.select: where order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert:
select last_insert_id();
insert into order_info
journey_id, company_id, node_id, power_id, driver_id, car_id, user_id, use_car_mode, service_type, state, tripartite_order_id, tripartite_platform_code, driver_name, driver_mobile, car_license, flight_number, demand_car_level, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, order_number, car_model, car_color, driver_grade, flight_plan_take_off_time, it_is_supplement,
#{journeyId}, #{companyId}, #{nodeId}, #{powerId}, #{driverId}, #{carId}, #{userId}, #{useCarMode}, #{serviceType}, #{state}, #{tripartiteOrderId}, #{tripartitePlatformCode}, #{driverName}, #{driverMobile}, #{carLicense}, #{flightNumber}, #{demandCarLevel}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{orderNumber}, #{carModel}, #{carColor}, #{driverGrade}, #{flightPlanTakeOffTime}, #{itIsSupplement},
mapper.delete:
delete from order_info where order_id in
#{orderId}
mapper.select:
select * from ( select (select ecti1.`name` from enterprise_car_type_info ecti1 where ecti1.car_type_id=ai.car_type_id) carTypeName, jn.use_time useTime, o.order_number orderNumber, ai.it_is_self_driver selfDriver, jpi.`name` useCarName, jpi.mobile useCarMobile, oai.action_time useCarDate, oai.address beginAddress, o.order_id orderId, o.create_time, o.it_is_supplement itIsSupplement, opi.state payState, ecti.`level`, o.use_car_mode useCarMode, o.state, jn.service_type serviceType, (select state from order_state_trace_info sti where sti.order_id=o.order_id order by trace_id desc limit 1) labelState from order_info o left join journey_info jn on o.journey_id=jn.journey_id LEFT join order_pay_info opi on o.order_id = opi.order_id left join journey_node_info jni on jni.node_id=o.node_id left join car_info ci on ci.car_id=o.car_id left join enterprise_car_type_info ecti on ecti.car_type_id=ci.car_type_id left join order_address_info oai on oai.order_id=o.order_id and oai.type='A000' left join order_address_info oai2 on oai2.order_id=o.order_id and oai2.type='A999' left join apply_info ai on ai.journey_id=o.journey_id left join journey_passenger_info jpi on jpi.journey_id=o.journey_id where o.user_id in (select user_id from ecmp_user where dept_id=#{deptId} and status='0' and del_flag='0' ) and o.state in('S200','S299','S500','S600','S616','S699','S900','S635') )cc1 where cc1.labelState not in ('S930','S921','S911')
and cc1.state='S699'
order by cc1.create_time desc

SELECT a.order_id AS orderId, a.state, a.create_time as createTime, a.driver_name as driverName, a.car_license as carLicense, a.car_model as carType, d.apply_type AS applyType, d.update_time as applyPassDate, b.type AS serverType, c.plan_begin_address AS useCarCity, e.nick_name AS applyUserName, e.nick_name AS useCarUserName,
h.use_car_mode AS useCarMode, h.regimen_id AS regimenId
,f.content as reassignmentApplyReason,f.create_time as updateDate
FROM order_info a LEFT JOIN journey_user_car_power b ON a.power_id = b.power_id LEFT JOIN journey_node_info c ON a.node_id = c.node_id LEFT JOIN journey_info h ON h.journey_id=a.journey_id LEFT JOIN apply_info d ON b.apply_id = d.apply_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user e ON e.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN order_state_trace_info f on a.order_id=f.order_id
and a.state = #{state} and f.state = #{orderTraceState} and a.company_id = #{companyId}
GROUP BY a.order_id

select o.order_id orderId, o.state, if (o.state='S900','已完成','未完成') stateType, o.service_type serviceType, o.flight_number flightNumber, jn.use_time useTime, jn.it_is_return itIsReturn, jn.charter_car_type charterCarType, s.action_time useCarTime, s.address startAddr, DATE_FORMAT(jn.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') startDate, DATE_FORMAT(jn.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') endDate, t.address endAddr, IF ( o.driver_id =#{driverId}, ( SELECT state FROM order_state_trace_info sti WHERE sti.order_id = o.order_id ORDER BY trace_id DESC LIMIT 1 ), 'S279' ) labelState, o.driver_id driverId from order_info o left join journey_info jn on o.journey_id=jn.journey_id left join order_address_info s on s.order_id=o.order_id and s.type='A000' left join order_address_info t on t.order_id=o.order_id and t.type='A999' where (o.driver_id=#{driverId} OR o.order_id IN ( SELECT order_id FROM order_state_trace_info st WHERE st.create_by =#{driverId} AND st.state = 'S270' ))
and (o.state='S299' or o.state='S500' or o.state='S600' or o.state='S616' or o.state='S635' ) order by s.action_time asc
and (o.state='S299' or o.state='S500' or o.state='S600' or o.state='S616' or o.state='S699' or o.state='S635' or o.state='S900' ) ORDER BY o.state = 'S900' asc, labelState = 'S279' asc, CASE WHEN (o.state = 'S900' or labelState = 'S279') THEN o.update_time END DESC, s.action_time ASC

select count(*) from order_info where (driver_id=#{driverId} OR order_id IN ( SELECT order_id FROM order_state_trace_info st WHERE st.create_by =#{driverId} AND st.state = 'S270' )) and find_in_set(state,#{states})

select o.order_id orderId, o.journey_id journeyId, o.state, o.driver_id driverId, o.service_type serviceType, jn.flight_number flightNumber, jn.it_is_return itIsReturn, jn.charter_car_type charterCarType,
jn.start_date startDate, jn.end_date endDate,
jn.use_time useTime, org.dept_name deptName, g.telephone groupPhone, u.mobile driverPhone, p.peer_number peerNumber, e.image_url imageUrl,
s.action_time useCarTime, s.address startAddr, t.address endAddr, DATE_FORMAT(jn.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') startDate, DATE_FORMAT(jn.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') endDate, t.action_time endTime, c.car_license carLicense, c.car_color carColor, c.car_type carType, o.user_id userId, z.state labelState, z.create_time labelStateOptTime, z.content labelStateContent, (select group_concat(short_address) from order_via_info f where f.order_id=o.order_id) halfway, (select count(*) from journey_passenger_info where journey_id=o.journey_id) peopleCount from order_info o
left join journey_info jn on o.journey_id=jn.journey_id left join order_address_info s on s.order_id=o.order_id and s.type='A000' left join order_address_info t on t.order_id=o.order_id and t.type='A999' left join car_info c on c.car_id=o.car_id left join ecmp_org org on c.dept_id = org.dept_id left join car_group_info g on c.car_group_id = g.car_group_id left join driver_info u on o.driver_id = u.driver_id left join journey_passenger_info p on jn.journey_id = p.journey_id left join enterprise_car_type_info e on c.car_type_id = e.car_type_id left join (select order_id,state,create_time,content from order_state_trace_info where trace_id in (select Max(trace_id) traceId from order_state_trace_info group by order_id)) z on z.order_id=o.order_id where o.order_id=#{orderId}

select o.order_id orderId, o.state, '未完成' stateType, o.service_type serviceType, o.flight_number flightNumber, jn.it_is_return itIsReturn,
jn.use_time useTime, jn.start_date startDate, jn.end_date endDate, jn.charter_car_type charterCarType, DATE_FORMAT(s.action_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') useCarTime, s.address startAddr, t.address endAddr, (select state from order_state_trace_info sti where sti.order_id=o.order_id order by trace_id desc limit 1) labelState from order_info o left join journey_info jn on o.journey_id=jn.journey_id left join order_address_info s on s.order_id=o.order_id and s.type='A000' left join order_address_info t on t.order_id=o.order_id and t.type='A999' where o.driver_id=#{driverId} and (o.state="S299" or o.state='S500' or o.state="S600" or o.state="S616" or o.state="S635")
and DATE_FORMAT( jn.start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY ),'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY ),'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT( jn.end_date,'%Y-%m-%d')
order by s.action_time asc

SELECT a.order_id AS orderId, a.state, a.demand_car_level as demandCarLevel, d.apply_type AS applyType, b.type AS serverType, c.plan_begin_address AS useCarCity, c.plan_begin_city_code as useCarCityCode, e.nick_name AS applyUserName, e.nick_name AS useCarUserName, a.use_car_mode AS useCarMode, a.driver_name AS driverName, a.driver_mobile AS driverTel, f.car_type as carType, f.car_license AS carLicense, h.regimen_id as regimenId, m.create_time as updateDate, d.apply_id as applyId FROM order_info a LEFT JOIN journey_user_car_power b ON a.power_id = b.power_id LEFT JOIN journey_node_info c ON a.node_id = c.node_id LEFT JOIN apply_info d ON b.apply_id = d.apply_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user e ON e.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN car_info f ON a.car_id=f.car_id LEFT JOIN journey_info h on a.journey_id=h.journey_id LEFT JOIN order_state_trace_info m on a.order_id=m.order_id where a.state in ('S200','S299','S600','S616','S699','S900') and m.state in ('S299','S279','S200') GROUP BY a.order_id

SELECT a.order_id AS orderId, a.state, a.create_time as createTime, d.apply_type AS applyType, d.apply_id as applyId, b.type AS serverType, c.plan_begin_address AS useCarCity, c.node_id as nodeId, e.nick_name AS applyUserName, e.nick_name AS useCarUserName, e.phonenumber AS applyUserTel,
h.use_car_mode AS useCarMode, h.regimen_id as regimenId, h.it_is_return as itIsReturn, h.wait_time_long as waitTimeLong, h.journey_id as journeyId FROM order_info a LEFT JOIN journey_user_car_power b ON a.power_id = b.power_id LEFT JOIN journey_node_info c ON a.node_id = c.node_id LEFT JOIN journey_info h ON h.journey_id=a.journey_id LEFT JOIN apply_info d ON b.apply_id = d.apply_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user e ON e.user_id = c.user_id where a.order_id=#{orderId}
where a.order_id=#{orderId}

select o.order_id orderId, o.journey_id journeyId, o.state, o.car_id carId, o.driver_id driverId, jn.service_type serviceType, IFNULL(o.flight_number,jn.flight_number) flightNumber, jn.it_is_return itIsReturn, jn.charter_car_type charterCarTye, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(oai.action_time,jni.plan_setout_time),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') useCarTime, IFNULL(oai.address,jni.plan_begin_address) startAddr, IFNULL(oai2.address,jni.plan_end_address) endAddr from order_info o left join journey_info jn on o.journey_id=jn.journey_id left join journey_node_info jni on jni.node_id=o.node_id left join order_address_info oai on oai.order_id=o.order_id and oai.type='A000' left join order_address_info oai2 on oai2.order_id=o.order_id and oai2.type='A999' where (hour(timediff(IFNULL(oai.action_time,jni.plan_setout_time),now()))+minute(timediff(IFNULL(oai.action_time,jni.plan_setout_time),now()))/60)<=2 and o.state='S299' and o.driver_id=#{driverId} order by IFNULL(oai.action_time,jni.plan_setout_time) asc limit 0,1

select o.order_id orderId, o.journey_id journeyId, o.state, o.car_id carId, o.driver_id driverId, jn.service_type serviceType, IFNULL(o.flight_number,jn.flight_number) flightNumber, jn.it_is_return itIsReturn, jn.charter_car_type charterCarTye, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(oai.action_time,jni.plan_setout_time),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') useCarTime, IFNULL(oai.address,jni.plan_begin_address) startAddr, IFNULL(oai2.address,jni.plan_end_address) endAddr from order_info o left join journey_info jn on o.journey_id=jn.journey_id left join journey_node_info jni on jni.node_id=o.node_id left join order_address_info oai on oai.order_id=o.order_id and oai.type='A000' left join order_address_info oai2 on oai2.order_id=o.order_id and oai2.type='A999' where (hour(timediff(IFNULL(oai.action_time,jni.plan_setout_time),now()))+minute(timediff(IFNULL(oai.action_time,jni.plan_setout_time),now()))/60)<=2 and o.state='S299' and o.car_id=#{carId} order by IFNULL(oai.action_time,jni.plan_setout_time) asc limit 0,1;
select count(*) from order_info where find_in_set(state,#{states}) and driver_id=#{driverId}

select s.company_id companyId, -- 申请人姓名 eu.nick_name applyName, -- 申请人所属部门/公司 eo.dept_name deptName, -- 申请人手机号 eu.phonenumber applyPhoneNumber, -- 乘车人 jpi.name passengerName, -- 乘车人电话 jpi.mobile passengerMobile, -- 同行人 jpi.peer_number peerName, -- 实际用车时间 oai.action_time beginTime, -- 实际下车时间 oai2.action_time endTime, -- 实际上车地址 oai.address beginAddress, -- 实际下车地址 oai2.address endAddress, (select group_concat(address_info) from journey_address_info where journey_id=s.journey_id) newEndAddress, -- 服务类型 1000预约 2001接机 2002送机 3000包车 s.service_type serviceType, -- 包车类型 T000 非包车 T001 半日租（4小时） T002 整日租（8小时） ji.charter_car_type charterCarType, -- 用车时间 ji.use_car_time, -- 用车方式 自有车 W100 网约车 W200 s.use_car_mode useCarMode, -- 订单id s.order_id orderId, -- 订单状态 s.state orderState, -- 费用合计 CONVERT(osi.amount,DECIMAL(10,2)) amount, -- 订单编号 s.order_number orderNumber, -- 轨迹状态 (select state from order_state_trace_info sti where sti.order_id=s.order_id order by trace_id desc limit 1) labelState, (select oddi.it_is_self_driver from order_dispatche_detail_info oddi where oddi.order_id=s.order_id) itIsSelfDriver, -- 用车制度 ri.name regimenName, di.driver_name driverName, di.mobile driverMobile, ci.car_license carLicense, s.create_by createBy, oodi.it_is_use_inner_car_group itIsUseInnerCarGroup, oodi.car_group_user_mode carGroupUserMode, oodi.next_car_group_id nextCarGroupId, cgi.car_group_name carGroupName, s.it_is_supplement itIsSupplement from order_info s left join order_dispatche_detail_info oodi on oodi.order_id = s.order_id LEFT join journey_user_car_power jucp on jucp.power_id=s.power_id LEFT join apply_info a on a.apply_id=jucp.apply_id LEFT join ecmp_user eu on eu.user_id=a.create_by LEFT join journey_info ji on ji.journey_id=s.journey_id LEFT join regime_info ri on ri.regimen_id=ji.regimen_id LEFT join journey_passenger_info jpi on jpi.journey_id=s.journey_id LEFT join order_settling_info osi on osi.order_id=s.order_id left join order_address_info oai on oai.order_id=s.order_id and oai.type='A000' left join order_address_info oai2 on oai2.order_id=s.order_id and oai2.type='A999' left join ecmp_org eo on eu.dept_id = eo.dept_id left join driver_info di on di.driver_id=s.driver_id left join car_info ci on ci.car_id =s.car_id left join car_group_info cgi on cgi.car_group_id = ci.car_group_id
and eu.nick_name like concat('%',#{applyName},'%') and eu.phonenumber like concat('%',#{applyPhoneNumber},'%') and jpi.name like concat('%',#{passengerName},'%') and jpi.mobile like concat('%',#{passengerMobile},'%') and s.order_number like concat('%',#{orderNumber},'%') and ji.service_type = #{serviceType} and ji.charter_car_type = #{charterCarType} and s.use_car_mode = #{useCarMode} and ji.charter_car_type = #{charterCarType} and DATE_FORMAT(ji.use_car_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{useCarTimeBegin},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and DATE_FORMAT(ji.use_car_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{useCarTimeEnd},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and s.order_id like concat('%',#{orderId},'%') and ci.car_license like concat('%',#{carLicense},'%') and di.driver_name like concat('%',#{driverName},'%') and eo.dept_name = #{deptName} and eu.dept_id = #{deptId}
and s.state in ('S911','S900','S699','S616','S600','S500','S299','S635')
and s.state in ('S699','S616','S600','S500','S299','S635')
and s.company_id = #{companyId}
and oodi.it_is_self_driver='Y000'
and s.car_id in ( select car_id from car_info where car_group_id in (select car_group_id from car_group_dispatcher_info where user_id=#{updateBy}) )
and s.state = (select state from order_state_trace_info sti where sti.order_id=s.order_id and s.state = #{orderState} order by trace_id desc limit 1)
group by s.order_id order by a.create_time desc

select si.name sceneName, srr.scene_id sceneId, s.order_id orderId, s.order_number orderNumber, eu.nick_name applyName, eu.phonenumber applyPhoneNumber, eo.dept_name deptName, ri.name regimenName, jpi.name passengerName, jpi.mobile passengerMobile, jpi.peer_number peerName, s.use_car_mode useCarMode, dif.driver_name driverName, dif.mobile driverPhone, ifnull(s.car_model,ci.car_type) carType, ifnull(s.car_color,ci.car_color) carColor, ifnull(s.car_license,ci.car_license) carLicense, s.state orderState, jni.plan_setout_time useCarTime, jni.plan_begin_address planningSetOutAddress, jni.plan_arrive_time planningArriveTime, jni.plan_end_address planningArriveAddress, oai.action_time beginTime, oai2.action_time endTime, oai.address beginAddress, oai2.address endAddress, (select group_concat(address_info) from journey_address_info where journey_id=s.journey_id) newEndAddress, s.service_type serviceType, ji.charter_car_type charterCarType, ji.use_time useTime, ifnull(ecti.name,s.demand_car_level) carLevel, CONVERT(osi.total_mileage,DECIMAL(10,2)) totalMileage, osi.total_time totalTime, osi.amount_detail amountDetail, CONVERT(osi.amount,DECIMAL(10,2)) amount, dhi.longitude currentLongitude, dhi.latitude currentLatitude, (select notes from apply_info where journey_id=ji.journey_id)notes, (select reason from apply_info where journey_id=ji.journey_id)reason, (select car_group_name from car_group_info where car_group_id= ci.car_group_id)carGroupName, (select car_group_name from car_group_info where car_group_id in (select car_group_id from car_group_driver_relation where driver_id=s.driver_id) )driverGroupName, (select state from order_state_trace_info sti where sti.order_id=s.order_id order by trace_id desc limit 1) labelState from order_info s left join journey_user_car_power jucp on jucp.power_id=s.power_id left join apply_info a on a.apply_id=jucp.apply_id left join driver_info dif on dif.driver_id=s.driver_id left join ecmp_user eu on eu.user_id=a.create_by left join journey_info ji on ji.journey_id=s.journey_id left join journey_passenger_info jpi on jpi.journey_id=s.journey_id left join order_settling_info osi on osi.order_id=s.order_id left join ecmp_org eo on eo.dept_id=eu.dept_id left join car_info ci on ci.car_id=s.car_id left join journey_node_info jni on jni.node_id=jucp.node_id left join enterprise_car_type_info ecti on ecti.car_type_id=ci.car_type_id left join regime_info ri on ri.regimen_id=ji.regimen_id left join scene_regime_relation srr on srr.regimen_id = ri.regimen_id left join scene_info si on si.scene_id = srr.scene_id left join order_address_info oai on oai.order_id=s.order_id and oai.type='A000' left join order_address_info oai2 on oai2.order_id=s.order_id and oai2.type='A999' left join ( select d1.* from driver_heartbeat_info d1, (select dd.driver_id,dd.order_id,max(dd.create_time) mtime from driver_heartbeat_info dd group by dd.driver_id,dd.order_id) d2 where d1.driver_id=d2.driver_id and d1.order_id=d2.order_id and d1.create_time=d2.mtime ) dhi on dhi.driver_id=s.driver_id and dhi.order_id=s.order_id
s.order_id=#{orderId}

select a.order_id orderId,use_car_mode useCarMode from order_info a inner join order_address_info b on b.order_id=a.order_id where a.driver_id=#{driverId} AND a.state=#{state} AND DATE_FORMAT(b.action_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now() ,INTERVAL 30 MINUTE ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') limit 1
select state from order_info where journey_id=#{journeyId}
select state from order_info where power_id=#{powerId} order by create_time desc limit 1
select order_id from order_info where power_id=#{powerId} and state !='S900' order by create_time desc limit 1
select state from order_info where power_id=#{powerId}
select order_id from order_info where power_id=#{powerId} and state not in ('S900')
select use_car_mode from order_info where power_id=#{powerId} order by create_time desc
where power_id=#{powerId} AND STATE !='S900'
select oi.* from order_info oi left join order_address_info oai on oi.order_id=oai.order_id and oai.type='A000' where oai.action_time < now() and oi.state in('S000','S100','S101');

select (select os.state from order_state_trace_info os where os.order_id=s.order_id order by os.trace_id desc limit 1) state from order_info s where s.power_id=#{powerId} order by s.order_id desc limit 0,1

select a.order_id AS orderId, a.journey_id journeyId, a.power_id powerId, '进行中' state, a.service_type serviceType, a.user_id userId, a.driver_id driverId, a.use_car_mode canUseCarMode, e.address startAddress, DATE_FORMAT(e.action_time, '%m月%d日 %H:%i ') useCarTime, e.longitude startLongitude, e.latitude startLatitude, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(e.action_time)*1000 useDate, d.address endAddress, d.longitude endLongitude , d.latitude endLatitude, g.charter_car_type charterCarType, (select state from order_state_trace_info sti where sti.order_id=a.order_id order by sti.trace_id desc limit 1) labelState, ai.apply_type applyType from order_info a left join journey_info g on g.journey_id=a.journey_id left join apply_info ai on ai.journey_id=a.journey_id left join order_address_info e on (e.order_id=a.order_id and e.type='A000') left join order_address_info d on (d.order_id=a.order_id and d.type='A999') where a.user_id=#{userId} and find_in_set(a.state,#{states})

select o.order_id from journey_user_car_power jucp left join order_info o on o.power_id=jucp.power_id left join order_state_trace_info osti on osti.order_id=o.order_id where o.state='S900' and osti.state in('S900','S901') and jucp.power_id=#{powerId}
SELECT * FROM `order_info` where state='S900' and FIND_IN_SET('S900',(select GROUP_CONCAT(state) states from order_state_trace_info where order_id=order_info.order_id))
select PROVINCE_NAME from china_province where PROVINCE_CODE=CONCAT(SUBSTR((SELECT city_postal_code FROM order_address_info where order_id=#{orderId} and type='A000') FROM 1 FOR 2),'0000')
select ROUND((TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,MIN(create_time),MAX(create_time))/60),2)duration FROM order_state_trace_info where order_id=#{orderId}
select GROUP_CONCAT(order_state_trace_info.state) from order_state_trace_info where order_id=#{orderId}

select ifnull(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,(select create_time from order_state_trace_info where order_id=#{orderId} and state='S100'), (select create_time from order_state_trace_info where order_id=#{orderId} and state='S299')),0)
where user_id = #{userId} and to_days(create_time) = to_days(now());
select order_id orderId,car_model carModel,car_license carLicense,driver_name driverName,car_color carColor from order_info where order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT DISTINCT -- 订单id oi.order_id orderId, -- 部门名称 eo.dept_name AS deptName, -- 公司名称 eor.dept_name AS companyName, -- 申请人姓名 eu.nick_name applyName, -- 申请人手机号 eu.phonenumber applyPhoneNumber, -- 乘车人 eu.nick_name passengerName, -- 开始时间 oai.action_time beginTime, -- 同行人数量 oi.tripartite_platform_code peerName, -- 预计结束时间 oaitwo.action_time endTime, -- 上车地址 oai.address beginAddress,
oi.use_car_mode useCarMode, -- 下车地址 oaitwo.address endAddress, -- 用车城市 -- cc.SHORT_NAME useCarCity, -- 用车场景 -- si.`name` userCarScene, -- 用车制度 -- ri.`name` regimenName, -- 服务类型 oi.service_type serviceType, -- 状态 oi.state orderState, oi.it_is_supplement itIsSupplement, oi.order_number orderNumber, CONVERT(osi.amount,DECIMAL(10,2)) amount FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN regime_info ri ON ri.regimen_id = oi.driver_grade LEFT JOIN scene_regime_relation srr ON srr.regimen_id = ri.regimen_id LEFT JOIN scene_info si ON srr.scene_id = si.scene_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user eu ON oi.user_id = eu.user_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_org eo ON eu.dept_id = eo.dept_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_org eor ON eo.company_id= eor.dept_id LEFT JOIN order_address_info oai ON oai.order_id = oi.order_id and oai.type='A000' LEFT JOIN order_address_info oaitwo ON oaitwo.order_id = oi.order_id and oaitwo.type='A999' LEFT JOIN china_city cc ON cc.CITY_CODE = oai.city_postal_code LEFT join order_settling_info osi on osi.order_id=oi.order_id WHERE 1 = 1 and oi.company_id=#{companyId} and oi.order_id=#{orderId} ORDER BY oi.order_id DESC
SELECT it_is_Supplement itIsSupplement FROM order_info WHERE order_id=#{orderNo}

SELECT DISTINCT -- 订单id oi.order_id orderId, -- 部门名称 eo.dept_name AS deptName, -- 公司名称 eor.dept_name AS companyName, -- 申请人姓名 eu.nick_name applyName, -- 申请人手机号 eu.phonenumber applyPhoneNumber, -- 乘车人 eu.nick_name passengerName, -- 申请人手机号 eu.phonenumber passengerMobile, -- 开始时间 oai.action_time useCarTime, -- 预计结束时间 oaitwo.action_time planningArriveTime, -- 开始时间 oai.action_time beginTime, -- 预计结束时间 oaitwo.action_time endTime, -- 上车地址 oai.address planningSetOutAddress, -- 下车地址 oaitwo.address planningArriveAddress, oi.use_car_mode useCarMode, -- 用车城市 -- cc.SHORT_NAME useCarCity, -- 用车场景 si.`name` userCarScene, -- 用车制度 ri.`name` regimenName, -- 服务类型 oi.service_type serviceType, -- 状态 oi.state orderState, oi.it_is_supplement itIsSupplement, oi.order_number orderNumber, CONVERT(osi.amount,DECIMAL(10,2)) amount, ci.car_type carType, ci.car_color carColor, ci.car_license carlicense, di.driver_name driverName, di.mobile driverPhone, ecty.`name` carLevel, osi.total_time totalTime, ji.charter_car_type charterCarType, (select notes from apply_info where journey_id=ji.journey_id)notes, (select reason from apply_info where journey_id=ji.journey_id)reason, (select car_group_name from car_group_info where car_group_id= ci.car_group_id)carGroupName, (select car_group_name from car_group_info where car_group_id in (select car_group_id from car_group_driver_relation where driver_id=s.driver_id) )driverGroupName, CONVERT(osi.total_mileage,DECIMAL(10,2)) totalMileage, osi.amount_detail amountDetail FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN regime_info ri ON ri.regimen_id = oi.driver_grade LEFT JOIN scene_regime_relation srr ON srr.regimen_id = ri.regimen_id LEFT JOIN scene_info si ON srr.scene_id = si.scene_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user eu ON oi.user_id = eu.user_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_org eo ON eu.dept_id = eo.dept_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_org eor ON eo.company_id= eor.dept_id LEFT JOIN order_address_info oai ON oai.order_id = oi.order_id and oai.type='A000' LEFT JOIN order_address_info oaitwo ON oaitwo.order_id = oi.order_id and oaitwo.type='A999' LEFT JOIN china_city cc ON cc.CITY_CODE = oai.city_postal_code LEFT join order_settling_info osi on osi.order_id=oi.order_id LEFT JOIN car_info ci ON ci.car_id = oi.car_id LEFT JOIN enterprise_car_type_info ecty on ecty.car_type_id = ci.car_type_id LEFT JOIN driver_info di ON di.driver_id = oi.driver_id LEFT JOIN journey_info ji ON ji.journey_id = oi.journey_id WHERE 1 = 1 and oi.order_id=#{orderNo} ORDER BY oi.order_id DESC
select * from order_info where car_id = #{carId} and state not in ('S699','S900')

SELECT s.action_time useCarTime, jn.use_time useTime FROM order_info o LEFT JOIN journey_info jn ON o.journey_id = jn.journey_id LEFT JOIN order_address_info s ON s.order_id = o.order_id AND s.type = 'A000'
WHERE o.order_id = #{orderNo}
mapper.update: update order_info set driver_id = null, car_id = null, use_car_mode = null, state ='S100', driver_name =null, driver_mobile =null, car_license =null, demand_car_level=null, update_by =#{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, car_model=null, car_color=null, driver_grade=null where order_id=#{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(cost.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') startDate, DATE_FORMAT(cost.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') endDate, cost.total_fee totalFee, oi.order_number orderNumber, ci.car_license carLicense, ci.car_type carType, di.driver_name driverName, di.mobile mobile, cgi.car_group_name carGroupName, cgi.telephone telephone, us.nick_name dispatcherNickName, us.phonenumber dispatcherPhoneNumber, jo.mobile riderMobile, pa.mobile applyMobile FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN journey_info ji ON oi.journey_id = ji.journey_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user eu ON eu.user_id = ji.user_id LEFT JOIN journey_passenger_info pa on ji.journey_id = pa.journey_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_org eo ON eo.dept_id = eu.dept_id LEFT JOIN car_info ci ON ci.car_id = oi.car_id LEFT JOIN car_group_info cgi ON cgi.car_group_id = ci.car_group_id LEFT JOIN driver_info di ON di.driver_id = oi.driver_id LEFT JOIN car_group_info cgiTwo ON cgiTwo.car_group_id = ci.car_group_id LEFT JOIN order_dispatche_detail_info det ON oi.order_id = det.order_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user us ON det.inner_dispatcher = us.user_id LEFT JOIN journey_passenger_info jo on oi.journey_id = jo.journey_id left join ( SELECT * FROM order_service_cost_detail_record_info WHERE order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1 ) cost on oi.order_id = cost.order_id WHERE oi.order_id = #{orderId}

select t.* from( select oddi.next_car_group_id as nextCarGroupId, (select concat(ui.nick_name,ui.phonenumber) from ecmp_user ui where ui.user_id=oddi.inner_dispatcher) innerDisNameAndPhone, o.order_id as orderId, o.user_id userId, o.order_number orderNum, eo.dept_name as deptName, eoc.dept_name as companyName,
'1' as operationPermission,
'0' as operationPermission,
2 as inOrOut,
1 as inOrOut,
eu.nick_name as applyUserName, eu.phonenumber as applyUserTel, oaib.action_time as useCarDate, oaie.action_time as endDate, oaib.address as startSite, oaie.address as endSite, cc.short_name useCarCity, oddi.car_group_user_mode carGroupUserMode, oddi.it_is_self_driver selfDriver, oddi.it_is_use_inner_car_group useCarGroupType, o.journey_id journeyId, case when right (osti.state,3)='100' then '待派车' when right (osti.state,3) >= '299' and right (osti.state,3) <= '900' then '已处理' when right (osti.state,3)='921' then '已过期' when right (osti.state,3)='930' then '已驳回' ELSE '' END state, -- 操作时间 case when right (o.state,3)='100' then (select create_time from order_state_trace_info sti where sti.order_id=o.order_id and sti.state='S100' limit 1) when right (o.state,3) >= '299' and right (o.state,3) < '900' then (select create_time from order_state_trace_info sti where sti.order_id=o.order_id and sti.state='S299' limit 1) when right (o.state,3)= '900' then (select create_time from order_state_trace_info sti where sti.order_id=o.order_id and sti.state in('S921','S930','S299') limit 1) ELSE now() END opDate from order_info o left join (SELECT state,order_id FROM `order_state_trace_info` where trace_id in (select max(trace_id) from order_state_trace_info GROUP BY order_id) ) osti on osti.order_id=o.order_id left join ecmp_user eu on eu.user_id=o.user_id left join order_dispatche_detail_info oddi on oddi.order_id=o.order_id left join ecmp_org eo on eo.dept_id=eu.dept_id left join ecmp_org eoc on eoc.dept_id=eu.owner_company left join order_address_info oaib on oaib.order_id=o.order_id and oaib.type='A000' left join order_address_info oaie on oaie.order_id=o.order_id and oaie.type='A999' left join china_city cc on cc.city_code=oaib.city_postal_code LEFT JOIN journey_passenger_info jpi ON jpi.journey_id = o.journey_id where 1=1 and o.order_id in (select distinct order_id from order_state_trace_info where order_id in (select distinct order_id from order_state_trace_info where state in ('S299', 'S921', 'S100','S930')) and order_id not in (select distinct order_id from order_state_trace_info where state in ('S270', 'S279', 'S277','S911')) ) and o.it_is_supplement='N000'
-- 系统管理员 and o.company_id=#{companyId}
-- 系统管理员+内部调度员 and (o.company_id=#{companyId} or (o.company_id=#{companyId} and find_in_set(eu.dept_id,#{deptId})))
-- 系统管理员+外部调度员 and (o.company_id=#{companyId} or ( o.company_id=#{companyId} and find_in_set(eu.dept_id,#{deptId}) and FIND_IN_SET(oddi.next_car_group_id,#{carGroupIds})))
-- 外部调度员 and o.company_id=#{companyId} and find_in_set(eu.dept_id,#{deptId}) and FIND_IN_SET(oddi.next_car_group_id,#{carGroupIds})
-- 内部调度员 and o.company_id=#{companyId} and (find_in_set(eu.dept_id,#{deptId}))
and jpi.name like concat('%',#{applyName},'%')
and jpi.mobile like concat('%',#{applyMobile},'%')
and oaib.city_postal_code=#{cityCode}
and o.order_id=#{orderId}
and eu.dept_id=#{useCarDeptId}
) t where 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT(t.opDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{optStartDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and DATE_FORMAT(t.opDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{optEndDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and t.state=#{dispatchStatus}
order by t.state='待派车' DESC ,t.state='已处理' DESC , case when state='待派车' then useCarDate end ASC , case when state!='待派车' then opDate end desc

select t.state, count(1) as count from( select oddi.next_car_group_id as nextCarGroupId, o.order_id as orderId, o.user_id userId, eo.dept_name as deptName, eoc.dept_name as companyName,
'1' as operationPermission,
'0' as operationPermission,
2 as inOrOut,
1 as inOrOut,
eu.nick_name as applyUserName, eu.phonenumber as applyUserTel, oaib.action_time as useCarDate, oaie.action_time as endDate, oaib.address as startSite, oaie.address as endSite, cc.short_name useCarCity, oddi.car_group_user_mode carGroupUserMode, oddi.it_is_self_driver selfDriver, oddi.it_is_use_inner_car_group useCarGroupType, o.journey_id journeyId, case when right (osti.state,3)='100' then '待派车' when right (osti.state,3) >= '299' and right (osti.state,3) <= '900' then '已处理' when right (osti.state,3)='921' then '已过期' when right (osti.state,3)='930' then '已驳回' ELSE '' END state from order_info o left join (SELECT state,order_id FROM `order_state_trace_info` where trace_id in (select max(trace_id) from order_state_trace_info GROUP BY order_id) ) osti on osti.order_id=o.order_id left join ecmp_user eu on eu.user_id=o.user_id left join order_dispatche_detail_info oddi on oddi.order_id=o.order_id left join ecmp_org eo on eo.dept_id=eu.dept_id left join ecmp_org eoc on eoc.dept_id=eu.owner_company left join order_address_info oaib on oaib.order_id=o.order_id and oaib.type='A000' left join order_address_info oaie on oaie.order_id=o.order_id and oaie.type='A999' left join china_city cc on cc.city_code=oaib.city_postal_code where 1=1 and o.order_id in (select distinct order_id from order_state_trace_info where order_id in (select distinct order_id from order_state_trace_info where state in ('S299', 'S921', 'S100','S930')) and order_id not in (select distinct order_id from order_state_trace_info where state in ('S270', 'S279', 'S277','S911')) ) and o.it_is_supplement='N000'
-- 系统管理员 and o.company_id=#{companyId}
-- 系统管理员+内部调度员 and (o.company_id=#{companyId} or (o.company_id=#{companyId} and find_in_set(eu.dept_id,#{deptId})))
-- 系统管理员+外部调度员 and (o.company_id=#{companyId} or ( o.company_id=#{companyId} and find_in_set(eu.dept_id,#{deptId}) and FIND_IN_SET(oddi.next_car_group_id,#{carGroupIds})))
-- 外部调度员 and o.company_id=#{companyId} and find_in_set(eu.dept_id,#{deptId}) and FIND_IN_SET(oddi.next_car_group_id,#{carGroupIds})
-- 内部调度员 and o.company_id=#{companyId} and (find_in_set(eu.dept_id,#{deptId}))
) t group by t.state

select -- 订单编号 ifnull(oi.order_number,'无') orderNumber, -- 用车单位 ifnull(eo.dept_name, '无') deptName, -- 联系人 ifnull(eu.nick_name, '无') nickName, -- 联系电话 ifnull(eu.phonenumber, '无')phoneNumber, -- 车辆类型 ifnull(ecti.name, '无') name, -- 乘车人数 ifnull(jpi.peer_number, '无') peerName, -- 目的地 ifnull(cc.short_name, '无') shortName, -- 用车天数 ifnull(ji.use_time, '无') useTime, -- 预约用车时间 ifnull(ji.start_date, '无') startDate, -- 出发地点 ifnull(oai.address_long, '无') addressLong, -- 驾驶员姓名 ifnull(di.driver_name, '无')driverName, -- 驾驶员电话 ifnull(di.mobile, '无') mobile, -- 用车备注 ifnull(ai.reason, '无') reason, -- 取钥匙时间，实际用车时间 ifnull(oaie.action_time, '无') actionBeginTime, -- 还钥匙时间，实际还车时间 ifnull(oai.action_time, '无') actionEndTime, -- 车牌号 ifnull(ci.car_license, '无') carNumber, -- 套餐价 ifnull((select distinct set_meal_cost from order_service_cost_detail_record_info where order_id=#{orderId}), 0) setMealCost, -- 超里程费用 ifnull((select sum(beyond_mileage_fee) from order_service_cost_detail_record_info where order_id = #{orderId}),0)beyondMileageFee, -- 超时长费用 ifnull((select sum(beyond_time_fee) from order_service_cost_detail_record_info where order_id = #{orderId}),0)beyondTimeFee, -- 路桥费用 ifnull((select sum(road_and_bridge_fee) from order_service_cost_detail_record_info where order_id = #{orderId}),0)roadAndBridgeFee, -- 高速费用 ifnull((select sum(highway_toll_fee) from order_service_cost_detail_record_info where order_id = #{orderId}),0)highwayTollFee, -- 停车费用 ifnull((select sum(stop_car_fee) from order_service_cost_detail_record_info where order_id = #{orderId}),0)stopCarFee, -- 住宿费用 ifnull((select sum(accommodation_fee) from order_service_cost_detail_record_info where order_id = #{orderId}),0)accommodationFee, -- 餐饮费用 ifnull((select sum(food_fee) from order_service_cost_detail_record_info where order_id = #{orderId}),0)foodFee, -- 其它费用 ifnull((select sum(others_fee) from order_service_cost_detail_record_info where order_id = #{orderId}),0)othersFee, -- 总额 ifnull(osi.amount, 0) amount from order_info oi left join ecmp_user eu on oi.user_id = eu.user_id left join ecmp_org eo on eu.dept_id = eo.dept_id left join car_info ci on ci.car_id = oi.car_id left join enterprise_car_type_info ecti on ecti.car_type_id=ci.car_type_id left join journey_info ji on ji.journey_id = oi.journey_id left join journey_passenger_info jpi on jpi.journey_id = ji.journey_id left join order_address_info oai on oai.order_id=oi.order_id and oai.type='A999' left join order_address_info oaie on oaie.order_id=oi.order_id and oaie.type='A000' left join china_city cc on cc.city_code = oai.city_postal_code left join driver_info di on di.driver_id=oi.driver_id left join apply_info ai on ai.journey_id = oi.journey_id left join order_settling_info osi on osi.order_id =oi.order_id where oi.order_id=#{orderId}

select t.* from ( SELECT o.order_number AS orderNum, o.order_id AS orderId, eo.dept_name AS deptName, eoc.dept_name AS companyName, oaib.action_time AS useCarDate, oaie.address AS endSite, o.journey_id AS journeyId, jpi.name AS useCarName, ecti.`name` AS carTypeName, ji.use_time AS useTime, CASE
WHEN RIGHT ( osti.state, 3 ) = '100' THEN '待派车' WHEN RIGHT ( osti.state, 3 ) in('380','299') and ai.it_is_self_driver='Y000' THEN '待出车' WHEN RIGHT ( osti.state, 3 ) >= '299' AND RIGHT ( osti.state, 3 ) <= '900' and ai.it_is_self_driver='N111' THEN '已派车' WHEN RIGHT ( osti.state, 3 ) in('900','699') and ai.it_is_self_driver='Y000' THEN '已派车' WHEN RIGHT ( osti.state, 3 ) = '616' and ai.it_is_self_driver='Y000' THEN '待还车' ELSE '' END state FROM order_info o LEFT JOIN ( SELECT state, order_id FROM `order_state_trace_info` WHERE trace_id IN ( SELECT max( trace_id ) FROM order_state_trace_info GROUP BY order_id ) ) osti ON osti.order_id = o.order_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user eu ON eu.user_id = o.user_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_org eo ON eo.dept_id = eu.dept_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_org eoc ON eoc.dept_id = eu.owner_company LEFT JOIN order_address_info oaib ON oaib.order_id = o.order_id AND oaib.type = 'A000' LEFT JOIN order_address_info oaie ON oaie.order_id = o.order_id AND oaie.type = 'A999' left join apply_info ai on ai.journey_id=o.journey_id left join journey_passenger_info jpi on jpi.journey_id=o.journey_id left join enterprise_car_type_info ecti on ecti.car_type_id=ai.car_type_id left join journey_info ji on ji.journey_id=o.journey_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND o.order_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT order_id FROM order_state_trace_info WHERE order_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT order_id FROM order_state_trace_info WHERE state IN ( 'S299', 'S100' ) ) AND order_id NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT order_id FROM order_state_trace_info WHERE state IN ( 'S270', 'S279', 'S277', 'S911', 'S921', 'S930' ) ) ) AND o.it_is_supplement = 'N000' AND o.company_id =100 and date(oaib.action_time) = curdate() )t where t.state= #{state} order by useCarDate

select t.state,count(1) AS count from ( SELECT o.order_number AS orderNum, o.order_id AS orderId, eo.dept_name AS deptName, eoc.dept_name AS companyName, oaib.action_time AS useCarDate, oaie.address AS endSite, o.journey_id AS journeyId, jpi.name AS useCarName, ecti.`name` AS carTypeName, ji.use_time AS useTime, CASE
WHEN RIGHT ( osti.state, 3 ) = '100' THEN '待派车' WHEN RIGHT ( osti.state, 3 ) in('380','299') and ai.it_is_self_driver='Y000' THEN '待出车' WHEN RIGHT ( osti.state, 3 ) >= '299' AND RIGHT ( osti.state, 3 ) <= '900' and ai.it_is_self_driver='N111' THEN '已派车' WHEN RIGHT ( osti.state, 3 ) in('900','699') and ai.it_is_self_driver='Y000' THEN '已派车' WHEN RIGHT ( osti.state, 3 ) = '616' and ai.it_is_self_driver='Y000' THEN '待还车' ELSE '' END state FROM order_info o LEFT JOIN ( SELECT state, order_id FROM `order_state_trace_info` WHERE trace_id IN ( SELECT max( trace_id ) FROM order_state_trace_info GROUP BY order_id ) ) osti ON osti.order_id = o.order_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_user eu ON eu.user_id = o.user_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_org eo ON eo.dept_id = eu.dept_id LEFT JOIN ecmp_org eoc ON eoc.dept_id = eu.owner_company LEFT JOIN order_address_info oaib ON oaib.order_id = o.order_id AND oaib.type = 'A000' LEFT JOIN order_address_info oaie ON oaie.order_id = o.order_id AND oaie.type = 'A999' left join apply_info ai on ai.journey_id=o.journey_id left join journey_passenger_info jpi on jpi.journey_id=o.journey_id left join enterprise_car_type_info ecti on ecti.car_type_id=ai.car_type_id left join journey_info ji on ji.journey_id=o.journey_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND o.order_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT order_id FROM order_state_trace_info WHERE order_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT order_id FROM order_state_trace_info WHERE state IN ( 'S299', 'S100' ) ) AND order_id NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT order_id FROM order_state_trace_info WHERE state IN ( 'S270', 'S279', 'S277', 'S911', 'S921', 'S930' ) ) ) AND o.it_is_supplement = 'N000' AND o.company_id =100 and date(oaib.action_time) = curdate() )t group by t.state
select eo.dept_name as deptName from ecmp_org eo

select oi.order_id orderId, eo.dept_name deptName, eu.nick_name nickName, eu.phonenumber phoneNumber, jpi.name name, jpi.mobile mobile, di.driver_name DriverName, di.mobile driverMobile, ci.car_license carLicense, oaia.action_time beginActionTime, oaib.action_time endActionTime, ji.charter_car_type charterCarType from order_info oi left join ecmp_org eo on eo.company_id = oi.company_id left join apply_info ai on ai.journey_id = oi.journey_id left join ecmp_user eu on eu.user_id = ai.create_by left join journey_passenger_info jpi on jpi.journey_id = oi.journey_id left join driver_info di on di.driver_id = oi.driver_id left join car_info ci on ci.car_id = oi.car_id left join order_address_info oaia on oaia.order_id = oi.order_id and oaia.type = 'A000' left join order_address_info oaib on oaib.order_id = oi.order_id and oaib.type = 'A999' left join journey_info ji on ji.journey_id = oi.journey_id where oi.state=#{state} and oi.order_number like concat('%',#{orderNumber},'%') and di.driver_name like concat('%',#{driverName},'%') and jpi.mobile like concat('%',#{mobile},'%') and jpi.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and ci.car_license like concat('%',#{carLicense},'%') and ji.charter_car_type = #{charterCarType} and eo.dept_name = #{deptName} and DATE_FORMAT(ji.use_car_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginActionTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and DATE_FORMAT(ji.use_car_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endActionTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and oi.company_id = #{companyId}
and oi.car_id in ( select car_id from car_info where car_group_id in (select car_group_id from car_group_dispatcher_info where user_id=#{userId}) )
order by ai.create_time desc

SELECT o.order_id orderId, o.order_number orderNumber,-- #订单号 pa.NAME userName,-- #用车人 ct.NAME carType,-- #用车类型名 ct.LEVEL carLevel, adr.action_time actionTime,-- #用车时间 jo.use_time useTime,-- #用车天数 se.amount amount,-- #总费用 se.amount_detail amountDetai, -- #用车费用 se.out_price outPrice -- 其他费用 FROM order_info o LEFT JOIN order_address_info adr ON o.order_id = adr.order_id AND adr.type = 'A999' LEFT JOIN order_account_info acc ON o.order_id = acc.order_id AND acc.state != 'S005' LEFT JOIN journey_info jo ON o.journey_id = jo.journey_id LEFT JOIN enterprise_car_type_info ct ON jo.company_id = ct.company_id LEFT JOIN order_settling_info se ON o.order_id = se.order_id LEFT JOIN journey_passenger_info pa ON o.journey_id = pa.journey_id LEFT JOIN car_group_driver_relation r on o.driver_id = r.driver_id LEFT JOIN car_group_info g ON r.car_group_id = g.car_group_id WHERE o.user_id in ( SELECT user.user_id from ecmp_user user where user.dept_id = #{companyId} ) and g.car_group_id = #{carGroupId} AND DATE_FORMAT( #{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) <= adr.action_time AND adr.action_time <= DATE_FORMAT( #{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) GROUP BY o.order_id

select DATE_FORMAT(order_info.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')date,car_group_info.it_is_inner,car_group_info.car_group_id, car_info.source, order_info.* from order_info left join car_info on order_info.car_id = car_info.car_id left join car_group_info on car_group_info.car_group_id=car_info.car_group_id where order_info.car_id is NOT null and order_info.company_id = #{companyId} and date(order_info.create_time) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY)

SELECT g.company_id companyId, g.car_group_id carGroupId, g.car_group_name carGroupName, g.telephone telephone, g.account_name accountName, g.bank_name bankName, g.bank_account bankAccount , o.dept_name deptName FROM car_group_info g LEFT JOIN ecmp_org o ON g.company_id = o.dept_id where g.car_group_id in ( SELECT car_group_id from car_group_dispatcher_info where user_id =#{userId} ) limit 1

SELECT g.company_id companyId, g.car_group_id carGroupId, g.car_group_name carGroupName, g.telephone telephone, g.account_name accountName, g.bank_name bankName, g.bank_account bankAccount , o.dept_name deptName FROM car_group_info g LEFT JOIN ecmp_org o ON g.company_id = o.dept_id where g.car_group_id = #{carGroupId} limit 1
